name: Union Armado
trigger: Add 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
text: Counter: Up to 1 of your FILM type Leader or Characters gains +4000 Power during this battle. If that card is a Character, that Character cannot be K.O.'d during this turn.

effect.text: Up to 1 FILM Leader/Character gains +4000 Power this battle. If Character, cannot be K.O.'d this turn.
Add 1 DON!! from DON deck and set as active.
